data.description:
Make Music in VR - This is not a rhythm game!

Immerse yourself in live looping and music production in VR.

- Synced looping with content library, auto time-stretched and pitch-shifted to fit the song.
- Record vocals including mo-cap and replay of your avatar.
- Use your custom Ready Player Me avatar.
- Set of drum kits/one-shots.
- Use Decks to create a seamless mix.
- Full set of audio FX applied per clip or per scene (reverbs, chorus etc). 
- Loop record automation of audio FX parameters and synth parameters.
- Assignable 3D control of FX and synth parameters.
- Loop videos synced to the beat.
- Step sequencer - trigger any item in the world and loop record instruments/drumkits. Edit steps, swing quantize.
- Built in Analog Synth sim and Wavetable synth with >250 Sounds
- Spatial Mixing - create a binaural mix based on clip positions.
- In game camera and screen/mirror.
- Use your USB Midi keyboard or controller

changelog.change_log:
- Made hands spawn each time on switch to hand tracking, fixes interaction pointer sometimes not responding on switch to controllers
- Step seq start quantize fix
- Fixed synth controls sometimes not created on load saved session
- Added ability to drag clips above each other to create a song/stack, and drag clip onto scene in a song to add another scene containing the clip

- 2D popups open smooth with better performance
- Unreal 5.4.3 build
- Better performance in Stage worlds
- Better video lighting performance
- Fixed visual glitch when snap turning
- Move songs into Stacks in the save load browser
- VFX now primed at startup so they load quick without hitching
- Later creation of Avatar chooser mirror prevents frame hitch
- Drop and drop cues above each other creates a song/stack
- Added upgrade reminder
video no longer stops on load song

- Video sync refactor
- Small stage and Big stage worlds added
- New loading screen
Android direct video on Quest 2
- Android direct video on Quest 3 only

Video system refactor
Step sequencer can control videos including setting the loaded video
Add optional emit light setting on videos
Up to four different videos can be played at a time
fixed note stuck on, in editing synth parts
Fixed missing note-on when playing step sequencer follow in scenes
Fixed glitchy avatar motion playback when recording walking around
Improved performance of playing several avatar motion caps at once
Improved playback of avatar motion caps when triggered from scenes
Saving now includes a screenshot of the save

High performance video system refactor
Step sequencer can control videos including setting the loaded video
Add optional emit light setting on videos
Up to four different videos can be played at a time
fixed note stuck on, in editing synth parts
Fixed missing note-on when playing step sequencer follow in scenes
Fixed glitchy avatar motion playback when recording walking around
Improved performance of playing several avatar motion caps at once
Improved playback of avatar motion caps when triggered from scenes
Saving now includes a screenshot of the save

- Avatar recorder embedded in scene fixes
- Auto Follow scenes allows playback of whole song automatically
- Automaton recording performance improvements

- Added video recorder to camera system
- Updated DJ Deck models
- Added dominant hand so arm menu not obstructive
RPM new URL2, Step seq instanced optimised
New deck models, scroller fix on decks

- DJ/Decks refresh
- New single interface similar to DJ Apps
- On full version includes User Folders browser
- Sort by BPM, Key, Name
- Countdown displays and metering
- Changed Crossfader gain curves to match popular DJ software

- New step seq workflow, only clicking the step sequencer items sets the active item
- Fixed extreme slow down when flat step sequencer clips added to a scene and general slowness with flat step sequencers
- Drum kit refresh, new kits new kit layouts
- Fixed some wavetable kits not sustaining drums when hit
- Avatar recorder fixes - avatar mo-cap not stopping/gets stuck playing
- Fixed bad button size in save popup
- Fixed bug in timestretched avatar recorded audio not playing
- Fixed spatial audio to use binaural instead of panning
- Fixed clone of synth items
- Fixed synth not deleted when cloned upon clear scene
- Faster scene loading
Async load, new world browser

- turned off never occlusion test distance
- glass container for synth waveforms
- reinstated tutorial main
fixed rounding error on step seq play start
rebuild

Video to electra,  stereo layers
Avatar recorder refresh
widget restyle
